last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: After facing a thousand dangers, Huguette and her clan celebrate Serge's birthday. During a midnight bath, their last, they will realize that love is a mystery as beautiful as it is dangerous.

name: Happily Married
original_name: C’est comme ça que je t’aime
overview: In 1974, in the quiet suburb of Sainte-Foy, two discontented couples bring their kids to summer camp. Once home, they must face the pitiful state their marriages are in. Unable to deal with their problems, they become the most infamous criminals in the history of organized crime in Quebec City.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In 1974, in the quiet suburb of Sainte-Foy, two discontented couples bring their kids to summer camp. Once home, they must face the pitiful state their marriages are in. Unable to deal with their problems, they become the most infamous criminals in the history of organized crime in Quebec City.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Summer 1975. The Delisle and Paquette families once again drive their kids to summer camp. They have three weeks to regain control of their criminal empire. As they try to defend their Organization all the way to Montreal, they realize something: bombs and guns can kill, but nothing is more dangerous than a broken heart.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview:
Huguette Delisle couldn't have fallen any lower, but her vengeance will be all the more terrible in this final season of twists and turns. We return to the Delisles and Paquettes in the summer of 1976.

Sexism is back with a vengeance in Sainte-Foy, while Montreal organized crime maintains an iron grip on the town. Huguette Delisle has lost everything; she's a shadow of her former self. Quebec's biggest criminal has traded in her rifle for her apron. Will Huguette dare to plunge back into crime to save her honor and fight the prevailing machismo? Can she count on the help of Gaétan, Micheline, Serge and Marie-Josée? Together, will they have the courage to go all the way to Montreal, in this Olympic year, to track down the invader? But above all: will they finally find love?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: July 1974. The Delisles and Paquettes drive their kids to summer camp. On the way back home, there’s obvious tension between the two couples.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: With the tension between the couples at its peak, Huguette gets a visit from René, who makes her a dangerous proposition. It’s clear to him: Huguette is a stone killer. Has Huguette found her calling?

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: With the tension between the couples at its peak, Huguette gets a visit from René, who makes her a dangerous proposition. It’s clear to him: Huguette is a stone killer. Has Huguette found her calling?

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Huguette needs help from Gaétan, Serge, Micheline, and Marie-Josée to get out of a jam. Believing she has properly completed her mission, she goes to see the Kingpin.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Convinced that the Kingpin is getting ready to take his revenge and believing that she represents a danger to Gaétan and their friends, Huguette leaves the city without a trace.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Huguette, flattered by her new crime-boss reputation, is not ready to throw in the towel in her fight with the Kingpin. While Serge tries desperately to get his friends back on the right track.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: With Micheline on a cocaine bender in Montreal with Coco and Puff, Serge tries to convince Huguette and Gaétan that it’s time for the Organization to conquer the lucrative empire.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Huguette and her gang take advantage of the Kingpin’s exile to consolidate their Organization. But they hear a worrisome rumour: apparently, the Kingpin has formed an alliance with the Popeyes.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: With Huguette having lost her eye of the tiger and the Organization in chaos, Serge and his gang are offered the key to the city by the Pointe Sainte-Foy Chamber of Commerce.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: With Huguette having found her eye of the tiger again, the two couples make their way to Saint-Jean-Port-Joli to save the kids.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: In 1974, in the quiet suburb of Sainte-Foy, two discontented couples bring their kids to summer camp. Once home, they must face the pitiful state their marriages are in. Unable to deal with their problems, they become the most infamous criminals in the history of organized crime in Quebec City.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Summer 1975. Will Huguette Delisle, the new kingpin of Sainte-Foy, be able to regain control? What if violence isn’t the answer this time?

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Having declared war on the Sexists, Huguette gives a murderous mission to Gaétan, Micheline, Serge and Marie-Josée. Will they be able to summon the courage to kill?

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: While Huguette and her crew hold an event to define the Organization’s feminist aims, Gaétan finally gets a chance to test out his knife skills.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: While Gaétan is dealing with a troubling disappearance, Huguette questions the loyalty of the members of her Organization.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Huguette organizes a series of individual interviews in order to identify and punish the traitor hiding within the Organization.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: With the traitor still hiding in plain sight, a dinner is held to try to bring unity back to the Organization. After a meal rich in legumes, the truth bursts out.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: After a mysterious character in a yellow raincoat interrupts an already eventful evening, Huguette lashes out in a worrying way.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Serge cuts all ties with the Organization and Gaétan worries about his wife Huguette’s mental health.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The meeting between Huguette and Grazia takes a surprising turn. The night is upended by the arrival of Lucien, who seems determined to avenge the honour of his future wife.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: While everyone is gathered to celebrate Marie-Josée and Lucien’s wedding, Huguette Delisle must defend her Organization with her own life, and the lives of her friends and family, on the line.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Summer 1975. The Delisle and Paquette families once again drive their kids to summer camp. They have three weeks to regain control of their criminal empire. As they try to defend their Organization all the way to Montreal, they realize something: bombs and guns can kill, but nothing is more dangerous than a broken heart.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: While the Sexists rule the roost in Sainte-Foy, Huguette and her gang take advantage of their children's departure to summer camp to try to reestablish good neighborly relations.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: To prove that she has become a docile and harmless housewife again, Huguette participates in a beauty contest organized by the mayor of Sainte-Foy.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Huguette tries to convince her gang to go to Montreal to track down the invader. The criminal is back, the time for her revenge has come.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Huguette and her gang arrive in Montreal. On the dance floor of a trendy nightclub, they meet the Lavoie brothers and experience the craziest night of their lives.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: While Huguette and her gang are plunged back into a murderous spiral, Gaétan returns to Sainte-Foy to try to ensure his redemption. Will he hear the cries for help from his friends in danger?

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Huguette and her clan develop a daring plan to bring down the Montreal mafia. The most dangerous mission of their lives will be the occasion for important romantic connections.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Back in Sainte-Foy, Huguette seems uncertain about her future. What if his revenge was just beginning?

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: After facing a thousand dangers, Huguette and her clan celebrate Serge's birthday. During a midnight bath, their last, they will realize that love is a mystery as beautiful as it is dangerous.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview:
Huguette Delisle couldn't have fallen any lower, but her vengeance will be all the more terrible in this final season of twists and turns. We return to the Delisles and Paquettes in the summer of 1976.

Sexism is back with a vengeance in Sainte-Foy, while Montreal organized crime maintains an iron grip on the town. Huguette Delisle has lost everything; she's a shadow of her former self. Quebec's biggest criminal has traded in her rifle for her apron. Will Huguette dare to plunge back into crime to save her honor and fight the prevailing machismo? Can she count on the help of Gaétan, Micheline, Serge and Marie-Josée? Together, will they have the courage to go all the way to Montreal, in this Olympic year, to track down the invader? But above all: will they finally find love?
